Title: Aria - Ansley Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With the diverse Aria collection, Palmetto Living by Orian draws inspiration from the world over - reinventing timeless motifs in updated color palettes and practical modern materials. The handsome Ansley area rug is especially versatile with its classical pattern and antique abrash.

  • Delicate botanical motifs trace an elegant rhythm across this traditional area rug, each edge bounded by an equally intricate border. Use this piece where you want all the charm of a well-worn vintage textile without the complicated upkeep.
  • Aria collection area rugs are machine-made with exacting detail. The polypropylene rug pile is tightly twisted for plush volume underfoot, cut short for easy maintenance.
  • Vacuum regularly with the beater brush component disengaged. Rotate periodically to promote even wear.
  • Made in the United States.

If you love nature-inspired decor, get ready to fall for this beautiful Digital Stream area rug from the Riverstone collection by Palmetto Living by Orian.

  • Orian is a respected rug manufacturer with decades in the industry, and the Riverstone collection is their most versatile one yet.
  • This earthy-toned rug could work well in most chic, transitional, or modern spaces-try it in the dining area or bedroom.
  • Enjoy this machine-made high pile at 5/8-inch thick and place the rug on a quality pad to minimize wear and tear over the years.
  • Vacuum both sides of your rug at least once per week, and blot spills with warm soapy water to keep it soft for years to come.

Title: Illusions - Marble Hill Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Accent your interior with a luxurious look, all without sacrificing a drop of comfort. The beautiful Marble Hill area rug features a striated pattern like a slab of richly veined stone, part of the practical Illusions collection from Palmetto Living by Orian.

  • Easy-to-clean synthetic yarns allow this piece to retain its pristine aesthetic even in active family environments.
  • Use this contemporary area rug in casual and formal placements alike - great for upscale bedroom themes, modern living rooms, and even dining arrangements.
  • Marble Hill features a 100% polypropylene rug pile, backed with durable jute for stability. This piece is made by machine for consistency and value.
  • Quickly address any spills by blotting gently with a dry white cloth or dabbing with a clean sponge.

Title: Riverstone - Laveen Area Rug
Body (HTML):
If you love traditional designs with a twist of modern, this plush Laveen area rug from the Riverstone collection by Palmetto Living by Orian might be just what you're looking for.

  • The Riverstone collection features soft-yet-durable rugs with a muted earthy palette and traditional-inspired designs to create chic rugs like this one.
  • This eye-catching geometric pattern would work well in a dining area or den, especially when paired with like colors.
  • This rug is power-loomed with a blend of natural and synthetic fibers for lasting durability and ease of care-it lasts longest when placed in a low to moderate traffic zone.
  • Vacuum both sides of your rug at least once per week and turn the beater bar off to avoid damaging the pile.

Title: Aria - Kashmir Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Part of the Aria collection from Palmetto Living by Orian, the brilliant Kashmir area rug draws from a rich history of timeless rug motifs - made practical for everyday enjoyment with strong synthetics and innovative modern construction.

  • Use this enchanting traditional area rug to lend a sense of formality to your favorite interior arrangement, or to bring thematic contrast to a more casual interior theme.
  • Machine-made with a 100% polypropylene rug pile, this style is built to perform even in your most demanding interior placements. The pile is kept low and tight for enduring plushness.
  • Protect the integrity of the fibers by disengaging any brush roll component before vacuuming. Rotate as needed to promote even wear.
  • Made in the United States.
